name: Music Runner (marcaronicheez)
description:
An endless runner where you get to choose the music that is generated.

Get as far as you can, as fast as you can.

Pick up music blocks which add elements of the music and give you extra movement bonuses. Find beacons along the way which cause a transition to occur, changing the genre of the music.

Headphones recommended.

There are currently 31 elements of music (Made by Fritz Keyzer). More to come.
